Rowdy Wolf:







Rowdy Wolf thought. "My territory is here." He grinned. "My cave is only a 
few yards from here. It is in the newly claimed Predacon lands now. There 
had been new lands claimed by them." He paused. "Do you think you territory 
is property of the Predacons? I am not familiar with it. What sector is it 
in?"
